extendedInfo.description: The best Thermal Camera application for Android is finally here!Like us on Facebook and stay tuned for all new cool releases and updates: http://www.facebook.com/FingersoftCheck out our latest release the Cartoon Camera! It's one of the coolest FREE Android apps out there. You can create cool cartoon style images with it and the effect is shown in realtime!Note: This app has no means to detect real temperature. This simulates the color theme of a thermal vision camera to provide you the tools to create cool photos.Tune the effect with color offset setting and 4 different color presets. Download now and start taking some seriously cool photos and maybe make your friends think your Android device is capable of real thermal vision.Features:- Real-time thermal vision effect- Save images quickly by a single touch of a button- Supports auto focus (tap anywhere on the screen)- Supports camera flash- Supports front camera (requires Android 2.3+)- Supports zoom (slider on the left side of the screen)- Adjustable color offset (slider on the right side of the screen)- 4 different color presets for getting the best look for your photos- App can be installed to SD- Saved images are stored to external storage under ThermalVisionCamera folderWe have tested this with following devices:- Samsung Galaxy S2- Samsung Galaxy Mini- Motorola Defy (quite low framerate, still works fine)Known issues: - Image orientation is incorrect on some tabletsAd-Free operation is unlocked through offers provided by our sponsors.If you have any issues with this app, don't hesitate to contact us at support@fingersoft.net. We hope you enjoy this app.

reviews.title: Cool
reviews.comment: I was looking for such an app for a long time. Finally i got it. It really works good. Though some problm fixations are a must. Overall cool app.
reviews.author: Manash Chakraborty

reviews.title: Loved it!!
reviews.comment: Lol...works great ...easy to use and lots of fun..even takes pics..
reviews.author: Manuel Rodriguez

reviews.title: Wonderful Aspect
reviews.comment: It has a cool unique and beautiful tye-dyed  color we can change it different temperatures um it\'s a very great app on my android I hope that you make more great apps just like it :)
reviews.author: phillipamanda smith

reviews.title: Not thermal
reviews.comment: Ok get it clear not thermal imaging but still a very cool app to see reflected light in an array of colours. Perhaps useful for ghost hunting. I would not call it night vision either as even using a torch in a dark room i could see more. Cool app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Heat it up and Cool it down
reviews.comment: I absolutely Love it! It is great high quality and the pics are great!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Awesome app!
reviews.comment: It really works like a thermal camera. Love the full range options n inversed views. Great app n I am 110% pleased! Thank you developers!
reviews.author: Lici Maslo

reviews.title: FAKE
reviews.comment: apparently, my freezer puts off a lot of heat when the door is open... also, my foot only puts off a little heat from one angle, and none from another. dont waste your time.
reviews.author: darkk flux

reviews.title: David
reviews.comment: Able to find air infiltration and seal them. Will save me money once heating and cooling. I have spotted deer in my yard at a salt lick I put out for tnem.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It seems on my camera / phone it percieves the color of light not the temperature of the surface being shot. A cool color study for photography none the less.
reviews.author: William Owen

reviews.title: Cool looking fake thermal
reviews.comment: App has zero ability to do thermal photography. Dev doesn\'t state this. Tested with 2 identical objects 20\302\260C apart. App marked both objects as same color temperature. Simply overlays an infrared imaging effect on the camera.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Read the description
reviews.comment: Comment before mine , cannot read... Description states basically that it does not read heat signatures... Learn to read before you condemn an app. It is a fun and impressive app. Works fine on Fusion Tablet.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice
reviews.comment: Interpretation and application is key here! If you know what to look for can make this app. very useful.
reviews.author: Gerald Allen

reviews.title: Very good for being free
reviews.comment: This is about the best thermal imaging camera iv gotten on here for free it doesn\'t lag you can change the color field for different uses of the camera I\'m happy with it
reviews.author: Stephanie Orozco

reviews.title: Thermal camera
reviews.comment: This is awesome for my line of work HVACR tech. A thermal camera can cost a grand or more. Can\'t wait to play with it some more at work.
reviews.author: Rick P

reviews.title: Awesome!
reviews.comment: This app is fun and entertaining. My kids love this app!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not a thermal camera
reviews.comment: This app just adds a filter. Does not detect any thermal data at all. SCAM
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Cool app
reviews.comment: Yes it doesn\'t pick up heat signatures(obviously) but it\'s a lot of fun and can be use full. Just use your imagination ; )
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Great App.. works really well isn\342\200\231t true thermal vision but very close, used it to find a couple things in the dark and it worked.
reviews.author: James York

reviews.title: Fake but still fun
reviews.comment: Its a pretty good apparently but its not showing thermal it show based on light, because I\'m pretty sure my cat gives off heat even in shadows.
reviews.author: Joshua Stephens

reviews.title: Terrible does not work
reviews.comment: All this app does is make light things orangey red and dark things blue DO NOT INSTALL!!!
reviews.author: Dan Johnson
